FizzBuzz
excited.description: Print numbers 1 to 20. For multiples of 3 print 'Fizz', for 5 print 'Buzz', for both print 'FizzBuzz'.

sad.title: Positive Quote
sad.description: Create a variable holding a positive quote and print it.
sad.solution:
quote = "Every day is a new beginning."
print(quote)
